chapters.title: Chapter 21:  Within the Stone
chapters.info: Rafela Cindal, p. 459—Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah with a round face. She is now sworn to Rand. She negotiated the treaty with the Sea Folk along with Merana. Min says that Rand should be able to trust her. She is now in Tear with Alanna, but the other Aes Sedai there are avoiding their notice.
